head.title: Le Grand Union High School District

meta.name: description
meta.content: Le Grand Union High School District serves 9-12th grade students and is located in Le Grand, CA.

a.span: Le Grand Union High School District

img.alt: Secretary of State - Voting In California
Secretario de Estado - Registrarse para votar

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 1800px; height: 900px;

div.div:
Updated: March 20, 2020 8:40 IMPORTANT:
The Governor’s statewide shelter in place does not stop schools from serving meals to students. Le Grand High School, Plainsburg School District, Planada School District and Le Grand Elementary School District will continue to serve the children who rely on us.
Please click on "Read Full Story" to view the article (Spanish & English) from the Merced County Department of Public Health.
https://www.lghs.k12.ca.us/apps/pages/index.jsp?uREC_ID=1487215&type=d&pREC_ID=video
This is a constantly evolving situation; more information will be distributed as it is available. For the most up to date information, please visit: https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus

img.alt: Talking to children about COVID-19 (Coronavirus) Featured Photo

div.div: Read about you can talk about the outbreak to your children.

img.alt: Looking For A Meal? Featured Photo

div.div: Read More To Find Out The Different Locations Serving Meals

div.sup: The Governor’s statewide shelter in place does not stop schools from serving meals to students. LGHS, Plainsburg School District, Planada School District, and LGESD will continue to serve
